name: TheAtlantic
text: Trump's loss, @noUpside writes, "has precipitated a deep rift in the right-wing information ecosystem." Media outlets, tech platforms, and commentators have had to choose between upholding reality and pretending that the president really won. https://t.co/f6lIvR3nAC

name: TheAtlantic
text: In this week's "Dear Therapist," @LoriGottlieb1 advises a reader whose parents have forbidden him from telling his younger brother that he's gay. https://t.co/YW4zD9FmyP
